mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET itemid=#{itemid}, custid=#{custid}, instructorid=#{instructorid}, odate=NOW() WHERE orderid=#{orderid}
mapper.select: SELECT o.orderid as orderid, it.itemname as item_name, o.odate as odate, it.itemprice as item_price, it.counting as counting, it.period as period,ins.instructorid as instructorid, ins.instructorname as instructor_name FROM item it INNER JOIN orders as o ON it.itemid=o.itemid LEFT OUTER JOIN instructor ins ON ins.instructorid=o.instructorid WHERE o.custid = #{custid}

SELECT f.facilityname as facility_name, ins.instructorname as instructor_name, i.itemname as item_name, i.counting as counting , i.period as period, o.custid as custid ,ins.instructorid as instructorid FROM orders o INNER JOIN item i ON i.itemid=o.itemid LEFT OUTER JOIN instructor ins ON ins.instructorid=o.instructorid INNER JOIN facility f ON f.facilityid=i.facilityid WHERE custid=#{custid}
